title: What degrees can I get in one year? - Quora

response.answer_text: There are various kinds of courses available, from online courses to summer courses and intensive courses. Courses serve a multitude of purposes for different students, they are sometimes used to bridge the gap between different phases of academic study, or to provide additional professional training and qualifications. Top Courses Courses and short courses are offered in a number of fields. Have a look at some of the most popular courses: Design coursesEducation coursesComputer coursesEngineering coursesPsychology coursesMedical coursesFashion coursesHistory coursesMedia coursesArchitecture coursesTourism coursesCommunication coursesHospitality coursesHuman Resources coursesLogistics coursesLaw coursesAviation CoursesExecutive Language TrainingLanguage CoursesBusiness Courses Are you looking for business courses? Consider taking a course in one of the following business sectors: Business coursesManagement coursesAccounting coursesMarketing coursesProject Management coursesFinance coursesHotel Management coursesLeadership coursesManagement Training coursesRisk Management coursesSupply Chain Management coursesExecutive coursesLeadership development coursesBusiness Management coursesFinancial Management coursesBusiness Development trainingCorporate trainingExecutive Language TrainingCourses by location Have a look at some of the most popular courses offered in the locations listed below: Courses in LondonCourses in SydneyCourses in New YorkCourses in Los AngelesCourses in BostonCourses in DubaiCourses in DelhiCourses in TorontoCourses in UKCourses in USACourses in AustraliaCourses in IndiaCourses in FranceCourses in GermanyCourses in EuropeDistance learning courses in UKDistance learning courses in USADistance learning courses in Europe

There are many master’s degree programs in Canada, the UK, and other countries that take a year full-time to earn. Most in the USA take 2 years, but you can find some 1-year programs if you search around. As for legitimate Bachelor’s or PhD degrees, there aren’t any legitimate ones you can get in just 1 year unless you can obtain a hefty amount of transfer credit from previous studies.
